          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_485b532fa2246f77571d21a8fe7533c255399433</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing for the presence of starch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfung auf das Vorhandensein der Stärke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminer la présence de l'amidon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Testar para a presença do starch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esaminando a presenza di amido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμή για την παρουσία αμύλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba para la presencia del almidón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First in a series of three experiments used to test presence of substances in foods. This experiment tests for the presence of starch in bread using iodine solution.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbohydrates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iodine solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">starch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst in einer Reihe von drei Experimenten 
verwendete, Vorhandensein der Substanzen in den Nahrungsmitteln zu 
prüfen. Dieses Experiment prüft auf das Vorhandensein der 
Stärke im Brot mit Jodlösung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord dans une série de trois expériences 
testaient la présence des substances en nourritures. Cette 
expérience détermine la présence de l'amidon en pain en utilisant 
la solution d'iode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente em uma série de três 
experiências usou-se testar a presença das substâncias nos 
alimentos. Esta experiência testa para a presença do starch no
pão usando a solução do iodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Primo di una serie di tre esperimenti ha usato 
verificare la presenza delle sostanze in alimenti. Questo 
esperimento esamina a presenza di amido in pane usando la soluzione 
dello iodio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών πειραμάτων που χρησιμοποιούνται σε μία 
σειρά για να εξετάσουν την παρουσία ουσιών στα τρόφιμα. 
Αυτό το πείραμα εξετάζει για την παρουσία αμύλου στο ψωμί 
χρησιμοποιώντας τη λύση ιωδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero en una serie de tres experimentos 
probaban la presencia de sustancias en alimentos. Este 
experimento prueba para la presencia del almidón en pan usando la 
solución del yodo.</string>
          </description>
